A River Runs Through It is based on the true story of two fly fishing brothers, Norman and Paul, (Brad Pitt and Craig Sheffer) whose Reverend father ( Tom Skerritt ) tries to teach them life’s lessons by way of Fly Fishing. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: “Early Years” and “Adult Years.” While giving audiences an interesting view of the complicated, poignant life of the author, it also examines the struggle between intellectual and romantic approaches to life in juxtaposition with weakness, sins, good and evil.

Title : Saved by the Badman (1947)

A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The cat, left to fend for itself when its owners move away, has taken to killing the local pets, and is ultimately threatened with extermination.
